description.narrative: By 2021, local governments, especially in convergence counties and other vulnerable areas have strengthened capacity to assess WASH needs, plan, implement, manage and monitor Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH) services, which contributes to Wash â€“ General, Water, Water Supply. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, women and children have equitable access to sustainable, clean water and sanitation services, and practise improved hygiene and sanitation behaviours in humanitarian situations

description.narrative: Construction works of 11 water supply systems which were carried over from 2019 are in progress. Preparation of designs and bill of quantities of 15 water supply systems have been completed. Procurement of off-shore WASH supplies for nine counties and Ri water supply systems is in progress. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:27/08/2020
